structure.unit: ARTICLE III. CITY OF MIAMI MINIMUM HOUSING STANDARDS

text.section:
Sec. 17-67. Exceptions.
The provisions of this article shall not be applicable to migrant labor camps, as defined by Section 381.422, Florida Statutes, nor to tourist or trailer camps, as defined by Section 513.01, Florida Statutes, which hold valid, current licenses issued by the Florida State Board of Health. The provisions of this article shall not be applicable to temporary housing as defined in of this article nor to temporary housing utilized for dwelling purposes in times of local emergency, disaster, or urgent necessity, as determined by the Unsafe Structures and Hearing Officer. The provisions of this article shall be applicable to all other dwellings, housing and buildings and buildings used or intended for use for human habitation.
